name: Joik or Die
description:
Joiki or Die is about navigating a person through obstacles using sound/voice. The goal is to reach the end without dying. A sami song will be playing in the background and the expected behavior from the player is to sing/joik along the soundtrack. Player movement is handled using the pitch of the player’s voice. The game world is designed in such way that the player needs to follow the pitch of the song to prevent losing.

Can you finish the game?

Credits: 

Timo Kähtävä
Casper Tollefsen
Mikko Verhiö

Kaisli Rajamäki
Henri Vesterinen
